name: Contour Clip
description: Checks contours meet a specific boundary, otherwise extend/trim them

inputs.name: Boundary
inputs.description: The boundary rectangle to clip to

inputs.name: Create PlanarSrfs
inputs.description: Whether to create planar surfaces; may be slow with large quantities of contours!

outputs.name: Edged Contours
outputs.description: All contours with edges following the boundary

outputs.name: Planar Surfaces
outputs.description: Edge contours as planar surfaces (must be toggled on)
